amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of a competitive grant program, based on the Troops-to-Teachers program, to recruit from the private sector math and science teachers for high-need school systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 9 printed in H.Rept. 106-240 to create a competitive program, based on the Troops-to-Teachers program, to recruit qualified math and science teachers for high need school systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
